narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lesley Sanfilippo is a Social Worker, Clinical provider based in Red Bank, NJ. From 2018-07 through 2019-03, this provider received $122K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 426 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 90837 (90837), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-03, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
